content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```juliafunction extract_julia_code(md::AbstractString)

# Use Lib parsedown to parse the markdown document
using Markdown
m = Markdown.parse(ioBuffer(md))

# Initialize an empty list to store the code blocks
code_blocks = []

# Traverse the parsed document and extract code blocks
for node in m.content
if node isa MD.CodeBlock
push!(code_blocks, node.content)
end
end

# Join all the code blocks together with newlines
code = join(code_blocks, "\n")

# Remove the triple backticks code fence
code = replace(code, r"^```(.*?)```\n", "")

# Return the extracted and formatted Julia code as a String
return code
end
```
